full_summary:
# **W8476-236671/A - Third Party Bid Evaluation Review Services**

[Short Description]
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified suppliers to participate in the Solicitation W8476-236671/A for Third Party Bid Evaluation Review Services. The contract is expected to be 18 months in duration.

**Background**
The requirement is part of the Land Vehicle Crew Training System (LVCTS) project under Stream 3 Project Management Services. The purpose of this solicitation is to establish one (1) Contract for the provision of Third Party Bid Evaluation Review Services.

**Eligibility**
To be eligible, suppliers must meet the pre-qualification criteria under the Task and Solutions Professional Services Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-16TSSB. The list of pre-qualified suppliers can be found in the solicitation package.

**Scope of Work**
The contract will involve the provision of Third Party Bid Evaluation Review Services to support the LVCTS project.

**Security Requirements**
The successful supplier will need to hold a Secret level security clearance. Additionally, documents must be safeguarded at a Secret level.

**Key Dates**
* Tender closing date: 29-Nov-2022, 14:00 EST
* Bidder inquiries: Submit inquiries to Kelsey Lawrence (kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**
For further information on this solicitation, the Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants, and the Industrial Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada, please refer to the solicitation package.

**Contact Information**
* Kelsey Lawrence (kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca)

The Department of National Defence reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. [End of Solicitation Notice]
